bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Packing all items into the box.
goals.2: If there is a rigid object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: it is prohibited to lift and relocate a container
rules.2: before place a elastic object, push a elastic object first
rules.3: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
